aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content:
At {{gameName}} Alliance, we have assembled a team to bring you the latest in online entertainment, fun-filled experiences and instantaneous access to your funds. Our mission is to become the ultimate crypto gaming destination for our audience worldwide.

We are a part of the OKVIP alliance: Official Sponsors of Villareal CF, AC Milan and Argentina Football Association.

Check out sponsorships by our OKVIP alliance here. {{allianceName}}


{{gameName}} Alliance is owned by Omnispect B.V., a limited liability company registered in Curacao with company registration number {{companyRegistrationNumber}}, with a registered address at Abraham de Veerstraat {{registeredAddress}}, Willemstad.

{{gameName}} Alliance has passed all regulatory compliance and is legally authorized to conduct gaming operations for any and all online games of chance and wagering.
